title: Permantly Banned
body:
What a bullshit kids these days want to report cause they dish it out but cant take it back so they report and get you permanently banned  Game 1
merfEAH: ready cait time to get u some kills

merfEAH: where

merfEAH: scroll up have a look

merfEAH: and

All mine but do i report this game is gone to shit an all the skins an stuff i bought since beta wow now i cant get shit lol

replies.body:
I mean you probably deserved it? 

Show us some more chat logs, one isn't enough proof.

Permaban only happens if you've been banned a lot before.

Looks like you deserve it.

Welcome back to level 1 summoner (on a new account).
You can always send a [support ticket to Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they will discuss your case with you.
